text: The 2016 Indonesian Dangdut Awards was the third music award show presented by Indosiar television station and was televised live on Indosiar. The awards was held on November 9, 2016, at the Studio 6 Emtek City, West Jakarta, and was hosted by Indonesian presenters Ramzi, Rina Nose, Irfan Hakim, and Andhika Pratama. The awards ceremonies will held theme for "Bangga Dangdut Indonesia". Ayu Ting Ting led the nominations with three categories and get two awards followed by Rizki & Ridho. == Performers == {| class="wikitable" |- !Artist(s) !Song(s) |- |Dewi Persik |"Hello Dangdut" |- Lesti Andryani Cita Citata |"Medley Song" |- |Shiha Zikir Danang Pradana Dieva |"Sabda Cinta" |- |All Artists |"Viva Dangdut" |} == Presenters == * Iis Dahlia & Ikke Nurjanah — presented New Arrivals Male Most Popular * Inul Daratista & Lesti Andryani — presented New Arrivals Male Most Popular * Rina Nose, Ramzi, Andhika Pratama, & The Three — presented Group/Duo Dangdut Most Popular * Ayu Ting Ting, Julia Perez, & Zaskia Gotik — presented Dangdut Singer Male Solo Most Popular * Soimah Pancawati & Rina Nose — presented Dangdut Singer Female Solo Most Popular * Ivan Gunawan & Cita Citata — presented Best Costume Dangdut Appearance * Mansyur S, Rita Sugiarto, Elvy Sukaesih, & Hamdan ATT — presented Special Award for Songwriters * Nassar — presented Lifetime Achievement Award * Cita Citata & Dewi Persik — presented Dangdut Singer Social Media Darling * Ayu Ting Ting, Jenita Janet, Lesti Andryani, Devy Berlian, & Cita Citata — presented Dangdut Song Most Popular == Winners & nominees == The nominees were announced on October 21, 2016.
